sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASKET ( BASKET_SN, USER_ID, TATTOO_ID, COLOR, TATTOOIST_NAME, REG_DTM, UPD_DTM ) VALUES( NULL, #USER_ID#, #TATTOO_ID#, #COLOR#, #TATTOOIST_NAME#, #REG_DTM#, #UPD_DTM# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.COLOR, A.TATTOOIST_NAME, B.IMAGE, B.PRICE, B.NM FROM BASKET A JOIN TATTOO B ON A.TATTOO_ID = B.ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #id#
